name: Clipboard-boss
tagline: Java application to manage a system clipboard
body:
### Clipboard Boss is an free utility software for manage the clipboard history. 

The project is multilanguage and crossplatform, that is somehow is regularly updated and supported. 

Itâ€™s simple little fast program that non impact the system performances.

Runs on all platforms: Windows, Linux, Mac OS X.

Translated in four language: English, Italian, French, German.

Completely Free, no spyware, no ads and no user tracking.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
